Files

cargo_doc2readme/
verify.rs

1use crate::{depinfo::DependencyInfo, diagnostic::Diagnostic, input::InputFile, output};
2use log::debug;
3use memchr::{memchr2, memmem};
4use std::{
5	io::{self, BufRead},
6	process::ExitCode
7};
8
9pub enum Check {
10	/// Everything is up to date.
11	UpToDate,
12
13	/// The dependency info is malformed.
14	InvalidDepInfo(anyhow::Error),
15
16	/// The input (template or rustdoc) have changed.
17	InputChanged,
18
19	/// One or more dependencies use an incompatible version.
20	IncompatibleVersion(String),
21
22	/// The readme used an outdated "markdown version".
23	OutdatedMarkdown,
24
25	/// Input and output are different (no dep info was included).
26	OutputChanged
27}
28
29impl Check {
30	pub fn print<T: Into<String>>(&self, filename: T) -> io::Result<()> {
31		self.print_to(filename, io::stderr())
32	}
33
34	pub fn print_to<T, W>(&self, filename: T, out: W) -> Result<(), io::Error>
35	where
36		T: Into<String>,
37		W: io::Write
38	{
39		let mut diag = Diagnostic::new(filename.into(), String::new());
40		match self {
41			Check::UpToDate => {
42				diag.info("Readme is up to date");
43			},
44			Check::InvalidDepInfo(e) => {
45				diag.warn(format_args!("Readme has invalid dependency info: {e}"));
46			},
47			Check::InputChanged => diag.error("Input has changed"),
48			Check::IncompatibleVersion(name) => {
49				diag.error(format_args!(
50					"Readme links to incompatible version of dependency `{name}`"
51				));
52			},
53			Check::OutdatedMarkdown => {
54				diag.error(
55					"The readme was created with an outdated version of this tool"
56				);
57			},
58			Check::OutputChanged => {
59				diag.error("Readme has changed");
60			}
61		}
62		diag.print_to(out)
63	}
64
65	pub fn is_ok(&self) -> bool {
66		matches!(self, Self::UpToDate)
67	}
68}
69
70impl From<Check> for ExitCode {
71	fn from(check: Check) -> Self {
72		match check.is_ok() {
73			true => Self::SUCCESS,
74			false => Self::FAILURE
75		}
76	}
77}
78
79pub fn check_up2date(
80	input: InputFile,
81	template: &str,
82	check_file: &mut dyn io::Read
83) -> anyhow::Result<Check> {
84	let mut check_buf = Vec::new();
85	check_file.read_to_end(&mut check_buf)?;
86
87	// the error we will return if the byte-wise comparison failed
88	let mut err = Check::OutputChanged;
89
90	let search_key = " [__cargo_doc2readme_dependencies_info]: ";
91	// for loop over an Option: Runs zero or one times, but allows us to use break
92	#[allow(for_loops_over_fallibles, clippy::never_loop)]
93	for search_idx in memmem::find(&check_buf, search_key.as_bytes()) {
94		let sub = &check_buf[search_idx + search_key.len() ..];
95		let end_idx = memchr2(b' ', b'\n', sub).unwrap_or(sub.len());
96		let depinfo_str = String::from_utf8(sub[.. end_idx].to_vec()).unwrap();
97		let depinfo = match DependencyInfo::decode(depinfo_str) {
98			Ok(depinfo) => depinfo,
99			Err(e) => {
100				return Ok(Check::InvalidDepInfo(e));
101			}
102		};
103
104		// ensure markdown version matches
105		if depinfo.check_outdated() {
106			err = Check::OutdatedMarkdown;
107			break;
108		}
109
110		// ensure the input is up to date
111		if !depinfo.check_input(template, &input.rustdoc) {
112			return Ok(Check::InputChanged);
113		}
114
115		// ensure that the dependencies that were used in the readme still meet the current required
116		// versions. dependencies that are missing in the readme don't matter.
117		for (lib_name, dep) in &input.dependencies {
118			debug!("Checking {} = \"{}\"", dep.crate_name, dep.req);
119			if !depinfo.check_dependency(&dep.crate_name, Some(&dep.req), lib_name, true)
120			{
121				return Ok(Check::IncompatibleVersion(dep.crate_name.clone()));
122			}
123		}
124
125		// looks like everything is up to date
126		return Ok(Check::UpToDate);
127	}
128
129	// if no dependency info was available, first render the readme
130	let mut output_buf = Vec::new();
131	output::emit(input, template, &mut output_buf)?;
132	// eprintln!("output_buf = {:?}", String::from_utf8_lossy(&output_buf));
133	// eprintln!("check_buf  = {:?}", String::from_utf8_lossy(&check_buf));
134	// then filter out the [__cargo_doc2readme_dependencies_info] line
135	let filter_depinfo = move |buf: &[u8]| -> String {
136		buf.lines()
137			.map(|line| line.unwrap())
138			.filter(|line| !line.starts_with(search_key))
139			.collect::<Vec<_>>()
140			.join("\n")
141	};
142	let output_str = filter_depinfo(&output_buf);
143	let check_str = filter_depinfo(&check_buf);
144	// eprintln!("output_str = {output_str:?}");
145	// eprintln!("check_str  = {check_str:?}");
146	// and finally do a string comparison
147	Ok(if output_str == check_str {
148		Check::UpToDate
149	} else {
150		err
151	})
152}
